entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
